name: Canton Chinese Restaurant
text:
Canton Chinese Restaurant
588 West Arthur Street, Unit 6
Thunder Bay, ON, P7E 5R7
(807) 473-4088

Business Hours
Monday: 11:30 am - 3:00 pm, 5:00 pm - 7:30 pm
Tuesday - Friday: 11:30 am - 3:00 pm, 4:00 pm - 7:30 pm
Saturday: 4:00 pm - 7:30 pm


Kitchen is Closed 30 Mins. Prior to Restaurant Closing

頭抬 Appetizers

泰式魚餅 Deep Fried Fish Cake (Thai Style)
香脆蝦卷 Crispy Shrimp Roll (1)
咖哩角 Deep Fried Curry Beef Samosa (1)
蜜汁叉燒 BBQ Pork
湯 Soup (Serve One Person)

蟹肉魚肚羹 Crab Meat with Fish Maw Soup
粟米魚肚羹 Sweet Corn with Fish Maw Soup
鮮蝦雲吞湯 Shrimp Wonton Soup (5)
雞 Chicken (Complimentary portion of steamed rice with some dishes upon request)

G 212. 薑蔥炒雞片 Sliced Chicken with Ginger & Pineapple
G 213. 豉椒炒雞球 Sliced Chicken with Black Bean Sauce (Sizzling Hot Plates)
G 214. 泰式青咖哩雞 Thai Green Curry with Sliced Chicken & Veg
G 215. 照燒雞 Teriyaki Chicken (Sizzling Hot Plates)
216. 薑蔥雞球片 Chicken with Ginger & Green Onion (Sizzling Hot Plates)
G 217. 腰果雞丁 Diced Chicken & Vegetables with Cashew Nuts
218. 左宗棠雞 General Chicken

蔬菜 Vegetables

魚香炒什菜 Tofu with Mixed Vegetables
蠔油扒時蔬 Chinese Broccoli with Oyster Sauce or Garlic Sauce
干煸四季豆 Fried Green Bean
沙爹粉絲煲 Mixed Vegetable with Bean Thread in Satay Sauce (Casserole)
牛 + 豬 Pork + Beef

惹味牛柳粒 Beef Tenderloin Chinese Style (Sizzling Hot Plates)
蜜椒牛柳 Beef Tenderloin with Honey & Black Pepper (Sizzling Hot Plates)
薑蔥爆牛肉 Sliced Beef with Ginger & Green Onion (Sizzling Hot Plates)
蠔油芥蘭牛肉 Beef with Oyster Sauce and Chinese Broccoli
沙爹粉絲煲 Sliced Beef with Bean Thread & Satay Sauce (Casserole) G 231. 京都肉排 Peking Style Pork Chop
魚香肉絲 Pork Chop with Spice & Salt J 233. 椒鹽肉排 Pork Chop with Mushrooms & Ginger, Green Onion Sauce (Szechuan Style) G 236. 牛肉炒四季豆 Fried Green Bean with Beef G 237. 照燒牛肉 Teriyaki Beef (Sliced Beef, Bean Sprout, Green Onion, Mushrooms) (Sizzling Hot Plates) J 238. 麻婆豆腐 Ground Pork Fried Green Bean J 239. 南乳炆豬手 Stewed Minced Bean Curd with Ground
G - Gluten Free
Hot & Spicy
NOTE: Soy Sauce Contains Flour

Indicates Spicy

海鮮 Seafood

J 244. 椒鹽蝦 Deep Fried Shrimp, Spicy & Salt (Shell On) $25.50
G 246. 腰果蝦仁 Shrimp with Cashew Nut & Diced Greens $28.00
J 248. 椒鹽鮮魷 Deep Fried Calamari, Spicy & Salt $25.00
250. 八珍豆腐煲 Assorted Seafood & Meats with Bean Curd $30.00
G 253. 豆豉蝦仁 Stir-Fried Fresh Shrimp with Tofu $27.00
J 254. 沙爹粉絲蝦煲 Fresh Shrimp with Bean Thread in Satay Sauce (Mild/Hot) $28.50
G 258. 照燒蝦 Teriyaki Shrimp (Sizzling Hot Plates) (Fresh Shrimp, Bean Sprout, Onion, Green Onion, Mushrooms) $28.00

飯、麵 Rice & Noodles

揚州炒飯 Yeung Chow Fried Rice (B.B.Q. Pork, Shrimp, Egg & Green Onion) $21.50 G 260. 陽春炒粗麵 General Tao $27.00 (Sweet & Spicy, Shrimp, Chicken, Mushroom, Onion, Green Onion)
鹹魚雞粒炒飯 Salted Fish & Chicken Fried Rice $24.00
星洲炒米粉 Shredded Chicken Fried Rice $18.50
八珍炒麵 Assorted Seafood & Meat with Vegetable & Fried Noodle (Assorted Seafood, B.B.Q. Pork, Chicken, Chinese Mushroom & Vegetable) $28.50 G J 264. 四川炒麵 Szechuan Noodle (Hot) (Shrimp, Chicken, Beef, Bamboo strips, Napa onions, peppers & rice noodles) $27.00
蝦球燴飯 Fried Vermicelli with Gravy (Chicken, Shrimp, Onion, Green Pea, Egg) $27.00
豉油皇炒米 Fried Vermicelli with Soy Sauce (Shrimp, B.B.Q. Pork, Green Onion, Bean Sprout, Onion with Soy Sauce) $27.00 G 267. 廈門炒米 Fried Vermicelli Amoy Style (Shrimp, B.B.Q. Pork, Green Onion, Bean Sprout, Onion with Sweet Sauce) $27.00 G J 268. 咖喱炒貴刁 Pan Fried Rice Noodle with Curry (Shrimp, B.B.Q. Pork, Green Onion, Bean Sprout, Onion with Curry) $27.00 G 269. 泰式炒粉 Pad Thai (Shrimp, Rice Noodles w/ Egg, Bean Sprout, Tofu, Peanut) $27.00
干炒牛河 Sliced Beef Fried Rice Noodles (Fried Rice Noodles w/ Beef, Bean Sprout, Onion & Green Onion) $28.50
豉椒牛河 Beef w/ Black Bean Sauce Fried Rice Noodles (Fried Rice Noodles w/ Beef, Green Pepper, Onion & Black Bean) $27.00
肉絲炒麵 Fried Noodles with Shredded Pork (Fried Soft Noodles w/ Shredded Pork, Bean Sprout, Mushroom, Onion & Green Onion) $27.00
沙爹牛河 Beef w/ Satay Sauce Fried Rice Noodles $28.50
干煸伊府麵 Fried E-Fu Noodles with Mushroom $24.00
沙爹牛肉湯麵 Satay Beef Noodles in Soup (Onion, Green Pepper, Satay Beef & Soft Noodles in Soup) $16.50
雲吞湯麵 Wonton & Noodles in Soup (Shrimp Wonton, Green Onion & Soft Noodles in Soup) $16.50 G 279. 雪菜肉絲米 Pickled Vegetable & Shredded Meat w/ Vermicelli Soup $16.50
北菇滑雞飯 Chinese Mushroom & Vegetable w/ Soft Noodles on Steamed Rice $17.50
G - Gluten Free
J - Hot & Spicy

Saturday and Sunday, 11:00 - 2:00 the following menu is available:


Canton Chinese Restaurant
All Sauces Homemade
Small $3.75 Medium $5.75 Large $8.75
Extra Large $11.75 To Go Container $0.50

Deep Fried Wonton (10pcs) S

Crispy Spring Rolls (3pcs) S
Deep Fried Fish Cake (Thai Style) M
Deep Fried Calamari L
Deep Fried Spring Rolls w/ Pork (3pcs) S

Deep Fried Curry Beef Samosa (3pcs) M

Thank you!
